00064 /**
00065  * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00066  * they describe themselves.
00067  */
00068 CNAnalysisMethodFactory::CNAnalysisMethodFactory(bool bAdditionalWaves)
00069 {
00070     if (bAdditionalWaves) // apt-copynumber-wave
00071     {
00072         registerMethod(CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::explainSelf(), &CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::newObject);
00073         return;
00074     }
00075 
00076     // Reference methods
00077     registerMethod(CNReferenceMethodPDNN::explainSelf(), &CNReferenceMethodPDNN::newObject);
00078     registerMethod(CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::explainSelf(), &CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::newObject);
00079     registerMethod(CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::explainSelf(), &CNReferenceMethodAdditionalWaves::newObject);
00080 
00081     //Intensity Adjustment methods
00082     registerMethod(CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::explainSelf(), &CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodPDNN::newObject);
00083     registerMethod(CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::explainSelf(), &CNIntensityAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::newObject);
00084 
00085     // Log2Ratio Adjustment methods
00086     registerMethod(CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::explainSelf(), &CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::newObject);
00087     registerMethod(CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::explainSelf(), &CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodHighPassFilter::newObject);
00088 
00089     // Analysis methods
00090     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCN::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCN::newObject);
00091     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2::newObject);
00092     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::newObject);
00093     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodLog2RatioCyto2::newObject);
00094     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::newObject);
00095     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::newObject);
00096     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodGaussianSmooth::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodGaussianSmooth::newObject);
00097     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodGenotype::newObject);
00098     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::newObject);
00099     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodLOH::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodLOH::newObject);
00100     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::newObject);
00101     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::newObject);
00102     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCNNeutralLOH::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCNNeutralLOH::newObject);
00103     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodNormalDiploid::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodNormalDiploid::newObject);
00104     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodMosaicism::newObject);
00105 //    registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodNoCall::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodNoCall::newObject);
00106 //    registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCancer::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCancer::newObject);
00107     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::newObject);
00108     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCNCyto2Gender::newObject);
00109     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodSegmentCN::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodSegmentCN::newObject);
00110     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodSegmentLOH::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodSegmentLOH::newObject);
00111     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::newObject);
00112 
00113         // Chipstream method
00114         registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodChipstream::explainSelf(),  &CNAnalysisMethodChipstream::newObject);
00115 
00116     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCovariateSignalAdjuster::newObject);
00117     registerMethod(CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::explainSelf(), &CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::newObject);
00118 
00119 }

00124 CNAnalysisMethodFactory::~CNAnalysisMethodFactory()

00128 /**
00129  * @brief Create a pointer to a new CNAnalysisMethod object as described
00130  * in the string specification.
00131  * @param spec - Specification string
00132  * @return Pointer to new CNAnalysisMethod objects, must be deleted when
00133  * finished.
00134  */
00135 CNAnalysisMethod *CNAnalysisMethodFactory::CNAnalysisMethodForString(const std::string &spec)
00136 {
00137   CNAnalysisMethod *method = NULL;
00138   SelfCreate *create = NULL;
00139   create = SelfCreate::selfCreateFromString(spec, m_Docs, m_Creators, "CNAnalysisMethod");
00140   /* Check class type. */
00141   if(InstanceOf(create, CNAnalysisMethod))
00142   {
00143     method = static_cast<CNAnalysisMethod *>(create);
00144   }
00145   else {
00146     Err::errAbort("Class doesn't appear to be of type CNAnalysisMethod.");
00147   }
00148   return method;
00149 }
